text: Ramón Gómez Valdés de Castillo (2 September 1924 – 9 August 1988), often credited as Ramón Valdés, was a Mexican actor. He was best known for his role of Don Ramón in the popular sitcom El Chavo del Ocho. He was born in Mexico City, Mexico.
